title: RBI Monetary Policy Meeting August 2025: Date, time, what to expect from Governor Sanjay Malhotra on repo rate announcement
description:
Presided over by RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, this session gains added significance amid mounting global trade friction—most notably, the United States' recent move to impose a 25% tariff on Indian exports

The Reserve Bank of India’s Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) kicked off its three-day meeting...

title: RBI monetary policy hasn't lost sight of growth amid inflation targeting, Governor Sanjay Malhotra says
description:
The Reserve Bank of India has not “lost sight” of its growth objective, even as inflation targeting remains its primary mandate, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Monday. RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra. The central bank kept its repo rate unchanged in its August monetary policy meeting. (PTI)
